snippet: Raymond Felton, who returned this season to replace the popular point guard Jeremy Lin, has had a positive influence on the Knicks’ offense.
abstract: New York Knicks point guard Raymond Felton, who returned this season to replace fan-favorite Jeremy Lin in the starting lineup, has had a positive influence on the team's offense.
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton, who returned this season to replace the popular point guard Jeremy Lin, has had a positive influence on the Knicks’ offense.

headline.seo: Raymond Felton, a Knick Who Didn’t Want to Go, Is Glad to Be Back
headline.main: Knick Who Didn’t Want to Go Is Glad to Be Back
headline.print_headline: Knick Who Didn’t Want to Go Is Glad to Be Back
